description.value:
Various Talismans crafted by the Rune Priests of Fenris whose spirits are claimed to aid the wearer. Can be: Totem of the Bloodied Hunter (+1 damage from Righteous Fury), Totem of the Sea Wolf (+3 to one Drive or Pilot Skill), or Totem of the Sun Wolf (+3 to Awareness Tests).

Requirements

Deathwatch Initiate may start with one appropriate Chapter Trapping. Chapter: Space Wolves

Effect: Initiated

Notes: -
